  • Method Details

    • render

      public int render​(float tx, float ty, float tz, int cx, int cy, int cz, int offset, short id, byte additional, boolean[] sides, MeshingAlgorithm meshing)
      Description copied from class: BlockTypeAdapter
      Called when rendering the block into the world. Requires BlockMetaData.hasCustomRenderer() to be true.
      Specified by:
      render in interface BlockType
      Overrides:
      render in class BlockTypeAdapter
      Parameters:
      tx - The target x coordinate within the currently rendering chunk mesh.
      ty - The target y coordinate within the currently rendering chunk mesh.
      tz - The target z coordinate within the currently rendering chunk mesh.
      cx - The local block x coordinate within the chunk.
      cy - The local block y coordinate within the chunk.
      cz - The local block z coordinate within the chunk.
      offset - The index offset within the currently rendering mesh.
      id - The id of the block that should be rendered.
      additional - The additional data stored in the chunk for this block - can be used for rotation etc.
      sides - The visible sides of the block, indexed as specified in addBlock
      meshing - The meshing algorithm used to render this chunk.
      Returns:
      The new index offset after adding this block to the chunk mesh.
